replies.body: Damn, Riot really hates ADCs don't they?

Well, we can say one thing for sure.
There will be 4 more Arcade skins coming after these two arrive.
(my reasoning for this is because if you look down the bottom of the splash art, you can see 4 empty slots, with the others filled.)

EDIT: We may also see some sort of interaction between the 10 skins there will be (eventually) Like a team battle mode or some sort of thing like that, as you can see that they are separated into teams.

Can't Wait for the other 'Raid Boss' Skins to come out!
